aboutMeData.name: Anastasiia Yaitska
aboutMeData.title: Hello! I'm Anastasiia Yaitska
aboutMeData.body: A frontend developer with a passion for solving problems with code. I started my journey a year ago, and since then I've been constantly learning and improving my skills.
aboutMeData.body2: As a beginner, I am constantly seeking new challenges and projects to work on, collaborate with others, and I believe that working on projects is the best way to learn and grow as a developer.
aboutMeData.body3: When I am not coding, I enjoy spending time with my family and friends. In love with the mountains and nature

projects.title: Code Builder App
projects.body: An app for developers who want to create, save, and share code snippets. Includes authorization via GitHub.
projects.tools: Next.js, TypeScript, SWR, Next-auth, Monaco-editor, MongoDB, HTML, CSS

projects.title: Meal-sharing App
projects.body: An app for those who want to share a meal. The user can create a meal, leave a review about a meal, and place an order.
projects.tools: React, Material UI, Formik, Axios, Styled-Components, MySQL, Node.js, JS, HTML, Docker

projects.title: Phone-book App
projects.body: Private phone book. The user can register a new account, log into an existing account, add a contact, delete a contact, and search by name.
projects.tools: React, Redux, Material UI, Formik, Axios, Styled-Components, JS, HTML

projects.title: Image-gallery App
projects.body: An app for images search by name.
projects.tools: React using Classes, JS, HTML, Styled-Components

projects.title: Movies App
projects.body: An app where users can see trending movie announcements, search movies by name, and see details.

projects.title: Ice Cream
projects.body: A page where users can read about ice cream and see cafe working times and locations.
